channel.title: Results of the Rendir Cuentas Consultation on IATI - April 2012
channel.description:
In April 2012, the heads of the country partner organizations of Rendir Cuentas, met in Lima for a day of consultation prior to the IATI CSO Working Group in the UK during May.
This document is a summary of the main conclusions, agreements and proposals of their consultation : http://www.interaction.org/document/rendir-cuentas-results-latin-american-iati-consultation
